entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Goodnotes 6: AI Notes & Docs
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Marketplace ContentÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $10.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Goodnotes 6 (1 year)Ôºö$11.99
  • GoodNotes 5 UnlockÔºö$9.99
  • Goodnotes 6 Free TrialÔºö$0.00
  • Goodnotes 6 One-Time PaymentÔºö$28.99
  • Goodnotes 6 (1 Year)Ôºö$11.99
  • Marketplace ContentÔºö$1.99
  • Dotted Squares: Draft PapersÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Ever wish your notes could do more? With Goodnotes 6, they can! Step into the future of note-taking with Goodnotes 6, the best AI notebook for iPad. Write notes, convert handwriting to text, annotate PDFs, and use AI tools for study and productivity. Boost Professional Efficiency and Productivity ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to summarize, translate, and extract key insights from your notes, PDFs, and documents‚Äîperfect for your next important meeting. ‚Ä¢ Import, annotate, and organize PDFs, documents, and meeting notes. ‚Ä¢ Transcribe audio recordings from meetings so you never miss a detail. ‚Ä¢ Present like a pro, with a built-in laser pointer that is perfect for meetings and presentations. ‚Ä¢ Export and share notes via email, print, PDF, or images for easy collaboration. ‚Ä¢ Send files directly to your unique Goodnotes email for quick access on all devices. ‚Ä¢ New pen gestures like Scribble to Erase let you erase by scribbling, while Circle to Select helps you quickly select and edit notes‚Äîall without switching tools. ‚Ä¢ Convert handwriting to text for quick and clean professional notes. ‚Ä¢ Sync your notes across all devices with cloud sync through iCloud, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, and WebDAV. Powerful Digital Notes and Study Tools ‚Ä¢ Use AI-powered study tools help you learn faster and retain more information. ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to generate practice quizzes, summarize text, or answer questions, directly from your handwriting. ‚Ä¢ Powered by our in-house AI technology, Math Assist, converts handwriting to text on iPad and solves handwritten equations instantly. ‚Ä¢ Convert equations to LaTeX format for easy use in reports and presentations. ‚Ä¢ Memorize vocabulary and key concepts with AI-powered Study Sets using active recall and spaced repetition. ‚Ä¢ No more flipping through pages: Handwriting search makes all your notes instantly searchable, even handwritten ones. ‚Ä¢ Collaborate in real time with classmates by working on the same document for group projects and study sessions ‚Ä¢ Record audio with live transcription while taking notes, so you never miss a detail. Easily edit, search, and remove text from the transcript to review key points faster. Enhance Creative Digital Planning ‚Ä¢ Design fully customizable notebooks, templates, and covers to fit your style. ‚Ä¢ Mix handwriting, text, stickers, images, and drawings in a single notebook. ‚Ä¢ Stay focused with Smart Timer, and boost your productivity. ‚Ä¢ Browse the in-app Marketplace for stickers, washi tape patterns, as well as stylish templates, educational materials, and planners. ‚Ä¢ Organize your notes with unlimited folders and advanced search. ‚Ä¢ Get exclusive monthly downloads every month with a paid subscription. ‚Ä¢ Use creative tools like pencil, tape, lasso tool, layering, eyedropper, and image cropping to make your planner truly yours. Experience the best AI note app for students, professionals, and planners. Join millions of users who have transformed their workflow with Goodnotes 6, the best note-taking app for iPad. Download Goodnotes 6 for free and create your first notebook today. Website: www.goodnotes.com X: @goodnotesapp Instagram: @goodnotes.app Pinterest: @goodnotesapp TikTok: @goodnotesapp Privacy policy: https://www.goodnotes.com/privacy-policy Terms and Conditions: https://www.goodnotes.com/terms-and-conditions

entry.title: The Witness
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$4.99

Application Description

You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you. You don't remember who you are, and you don't remember how you got here, but there's one thing you can do: explore the island in hope of discovering clues, regaining your memory, and somehow finding your way home. The Witness is a single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious. There's no filler; each of those puzzles brings its own new idea into the mix. So, this is a game full of ideas.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Photo Eraser for iPhone
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

On Sale. Original $ 4.99. Photo Eraser magically remove unwanted objects from photos for iPhone and instantly fix your photos. Powered by the latest revolutionary photo InPaint algorithm, Photo Eraser performs the best among all other iPhone erasers that ruin your photos, including popular professional photo processing softwares. A variety of experiments shows the intelligent Photo Eraser will give you better and more natural, amazing results than any similar tools. Photo Eraser quickly remove unwanted objects from photos for iPhone, including logo, text, data stamp, watermark, acnes, people... without any specialist knowledge and instantly fix the photos automatically as if they were never there. InPaint, improve and repair your photos. It targets to be a simple yet effective photo healing app for all iPhone users. Get the magical photos done in seconds-to-minutes instead of minutes-to-hours. People all over the world use Photo Eraser for iPhone every day to beautify their photos. Free download Eraser for iPhone today to be more creativity! Easy to get use & started. You only need mark unwanted area by red color, Photo Eraser for iPhone will make your photo much better in a minute. ‚Ä®‚Ä® Photo Eraser for iPhone features highlights: ‚Ä® ‚àö Remove watermarks, date stamps and much more unwanted objects from photos for iPhone.‚Ä® ‚àö Delete unwanted people from photo for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Erase text, signatures and other undated objects from photos for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Make skin imperfections vanish for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Completely non-technical. ‚àö Support all iPhone device: iPhone 6s+, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6+, iPhone6, iPhone 5s, iPhone5c, iPhones 5, iPhones 4s, iPhone4, iPhone 3gs‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¢ Reviews by our users: - Works pretty well! by rfgf1 It does a fairly thorough job of removing things from the backgrounds of pictures, or objects that are not in the main focus of the original. Using the lasso and only straight lines and drawing a box around the object to be removed, is where I have seen my best results. - Amazing by Twon from VA Works great! I'm using a iPhone 6, IOS 8 Feedback: ‚Ä®Any suggestion will be appreciated, support email: market@effectmatrix.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

Application Description

Revitalize your Apple Music library! TuneShift intelligently matches your cherished music from NetEase Cloud Music and QQ Music to Apple Music platform. Say goodbye to tedious manual searching. With just a few simple steps, rediscover your complete music collection on Apple Music. Our smart engine ensures you find the closest matches to your original favorites. Core Advantages: ‚Ä¢ Premium music matching engine for precise track identification ‚Ä¢ Preserve complete collection structure and playback order ‚Ä¢ Real-time progress display ‚Ä¢ Minimalist design with one-click operation Privacy Protection: We prioritize user privacy, strictly adhering to privacy protocols to ensure your account information remains secure. Why Choose TuneShift: Professional music identification technology Superior matching accuracy Swift processing efficiency User-friendly interface Let TuneShift be your professional music management tool for the perfect Apple Music experience! Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Classic Maze game is a classic puzzle game, perfect for training your brain during a short break. It is designed as a very simple single player game played by sliding through fun retro mazes. Play a quick game and challenge 500 mazes to become the maze king.

entry.title: Money Pro: Personal Finance AR
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • PLUSÔºö$19.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $19.99]
  • GOLDÔºö$39.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $39.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

In-App Purchases

  • PLUSÔºö$4.99
  • GOLDÔºö$9.99

Application Description

EASY BUDGET. Cut your expenses with Money Pro¬Æ! Expense tracker, budget planner & account manager - all in one app to get your finances under control. Money Pro works great for personal & family expense tracking. Easy sync and iPhone/iPad versions combined in one app. Money Pro is the next generation of the Money app (over 2 million downloads worldwide). FEATURES: Simple and Secure - quick and easy expense/income entries: save your time - password & backups of your data Income and Expense Tracker - split transactions: split one payment into multiple categories, keep it all organized - search by amount, category, description, payee, cheque number, etc - recurring expenses with custom periodicity - calendar for scheduling bills and expenses for the whole year ahead - notifications & alerts for bills due - tracking expenses with family members and cross-platform syncing* (PLUS or GOLD subscription required) - multiple profiles for organized tracking of personal and family finances - attachment of receipt (or any other) photos: keep important bills captured Budget Planner - flexible structure of categories & subcategories with over 1,500 built-in icons - custom periodicity: start your budget from any date - visual indicators for budget spending - transaction list for each category: access your bills with ease - transferring the leftover of the previous budget period to the current one to limit your spending - unique icons with your photos Account Manager - easy management of an unlimited number of accounts - balance change history - additional fields for organizing your records: payee, description, check #, class (personal/business travel expenses). - import of bank statements (files: OFX, CSV) - online banking (GOLD subscription required) Insightful Analytics - eight different reports - filter customization - quick and easy date selection Augmented Reality - build three-dimensional charts right on your table with AR reports (GOLD subscription required) Goals - set your goals and achieve them - visualize your goal progress with a trend chart - four Goal types: Save money, Pay off debt, Reduce expenses, Increase income (GOLD subscription required for last three) More - calculator and currency converter - print and export to PDF, QIF, CSV formats - multiple currencies & automatic update of exchange rates - iCloud sync for iPhone, iPad, Mac (no subscription) - support service & user guide (https://money.pro/guide/) PLUS subscription - 1 Month of PLUS: $4.99 GOLD subscription - 1 Month of GOLD: $9.99 In all the countries (except the USA), actual charges will be converted to the local currency. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Terms & Privacy - http://ibearsoft.com/privacy.html - http://ibearsoft.com/terms.html Money Pro is a Universal app. Pay once and use it on your iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch. *See App Support for further details

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Goodnotes 6: AI Notes & Docs
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Marketplace ContentÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $10.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Goodnotes 6 (1 year)Ôºö$11.99
  • GoodNotes 5 UnlockÔºö$9.99
  • Goodnotes 6 Free TrialÔºö$0.00
  • Goodnotes 6 One-Time PaymentÔºö$28.99
  • Goodnotes 6 (1 Year)Ôºö$11.99
  • Marketplace ContentÔºö$1.99
  • Dotted Squares: Draft PapersÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Ever wish your notes could do more? With Goodnotes 6, they can! Step into the future of note-taking with Goodnotes 6, the best AI notebook for iPad. Write notes, convert handwriting to text, annotate PDFs, and use AI tools for study and productivity. Boost Professional Efficiency and Productivity ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to summarize, translate, and extract key insights from your notes, PDFs, and documents‚Äîperfect for your next important meeting. ‚Ä¢ Import, annotate, and organize PDFs, documents, and meeting notes. ‚Ä¢ Transcribe audio recordings from meetings so you never miss a detail. ‚Ä¢ Present like a pro, with a built-in laser pointer that is perfect for meetings and presentations. ‚Ä¢ Export and share notes via email, print, PDF, or images for easy collaboration. ‚Ä¢ Send files directly to your unique Goodnotes email for quick access on all devices. ‚Ä¢ New pen gestures like Scribble to Erase let you erase by scribbling, while Circle to Select helps you quickly select and edit notes‚Äîall without switching tools. ‚Ä¢ Convert handwriting to text for quick and clean professional notes. ‚Ä¢ Sync your notes across all devices with cloud sync through iCloud, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, and WebDAV. Powerful Digital Notes and Study Tools ‚Ä¢ Use AI-powered study tools help you learn faster and retain more information. ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to generate practice quizzes, summarize text, or answer questions, directly from your handwriting. ‚Ä¢ Powered by our in-house AI technology, Math Assist, converts handwriting to text on iPad and solves handwritten equations instantly. ‚Ä¢ Convert equations to LaTeX format for easy use in reports and presentations. ‚Ä¢ Memorize vocabulary and key concepts with AI-powered Study Sets using active recall and spaced repetition. ‚Ä¢ No more flipping through pages: Handwriting search makes all your notes instantly searchable, even handwritten ones. ‚Ä¢ Collaborate in real time with classmates by working on the same document for group projects and study sessions ‚Ä¢ Record audio with live transcription while taking notes, so you never miss a detail. Easily edit, search, and remove text from the transcript to review key points faster. Enhance Creative Digital Planning ‚Ä¢ Design fully customizable notebooks, templates, and covers to fit your style. ‚Ä¢ Mix handwriting, text, stickers, images, and drawings in a single notebook. ‚Ä¢ Stay focused with Smart Timer, and boost your productivity. ‚Ä¢ Browse the in-app Marketplace for stickers, washi tape patterns, as well as stylish templates, educational materials, and planners. ‚Ä¢ Organize your notes with unlimited folders and advanced search. ‚Ä¢ Get exclusive monthly downloads every month with a paid subscription. ‚Ä¢ Use creative tools like pencil, tape, lasso tool, layering, eyedropper, and image cropping to make your planner truly yours. Experience the best AI note app for students, professionals, and planners. Join millions of users who have transformed their workflow with Goodnotes 6, the best note-taking app for iPad. Download Goodnotes 6 for free and create your first notebook today. Website: www.goodnotes.com X: @goodnotesapp Instagram: @goodnotes.app Pinterest: @goodnotesapp TikTok: @goodnotesapp Privacy policy: https://www.goodnotes.com/privacy-policy Terms and Conditions: https://www.goodnotes.com/terms-and-conditions
